name: Mutton Yakhni Pulao Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mutton Yakhni Pulao Recipe: Rice 3 cups Mutton 1 kg Fennel Seeds 4 tbsp Whole all spices 3 tbsp Oil 1 cup Onion (sliced) 1 Chopped garlic 1 tbsp Chopped ginger 1 tbsp Salt 1 tbsp
instructions: Soak sela rice in a bowl. Then heat oil in a pan and fry onion, chopped ginger and chopped garlic in it. Then add mutton and whole all spices and cook on high heat for 5 minutes. Add salt and fennel seeds. Now add 1-1/2 liter water and cook on low heat until meat gets tender. Then strain the mixture. In a separate pan add mutton and stock and bring it to boil. Now strain rice and add them in mutton and cook on high heat until water gets dried. Now let it simmer for 15 minutes and serve
